titles: The boring of the eare contayning a plaine and profitable discourse by way of dialogue : concerning 1. Our preparation before hearing, 2. Our demeanour in hearing, 3. Our exercise after we haue heard the Word of God / written by that faithfull and diligent minister of Gods Word, Master Stephen Egerton ...
author: Egerton, Stephen, 1555?-1621?
notes: Signatures: A⁸(-A1) B-E⁸ F⁴(last leaf blank).
